text_elements.typography_notes: The text is stylized with a traditional brush script, enhancing cultural authenticity.

symbol.description: A traditional Korean house roof icon

color_palette.contrast_notes: The black text on a white background provides strong contrast, ensuring readability.

layout.balance_notes: The layout is balanced with the symbol and text aligned horizontally.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate spacing between elements ensures clarity.

issues.description: Brush script may be hard to read at smaller sizes.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a simpler font for smaller applications.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns with trends emphasizing cultural authenticity and heritage.
